Class ApiJsonParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.helidon.integrations.common.rest.ApiJsonParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApiResponse, CertificateGet.Response, DbGet.Response, Encrypt.Encrypted, GetCubbyhole.Response, GetKv1.Response, GetKv2.Response, Kv2Metadata, ListSecrets.Response, OciResponseParser

extends Object
    Helper methods to process a returned JSON.
